title: Olympic Summer Games - revenue generated from domestic sponsorships 1996 to 2016
yAxis: Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 6.
In general Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.

Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 1996_Atlanta to 2004_Athens, gradually increasing from 2004_Athens to 2008_Beijing, and finally roughly constant from 2008_Beijing to 2016_Rio.
The line significantly increased by 916.0 from Year 2004_Athens to 2008_Beijing.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2004_Athens and 2008_Beijing.
Maximum Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 1218.0 was reported at Year 2008_Beijing
The lowest Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 302.0 was reported at Year 2004_Athens
